dc:title: Wealth, The Humanity of Christ, Class War
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Working to improve the material conditions of workers is grounded in Christ's humanity and the reality of the Mystical Body. Relying on violence betrays both workers and the brotherhood of man.
